</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Squared distance between two 3D vectors. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vector1 [[vectorDistanceSqr]] vector2 </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vector1: [[Array]] - vector 3D or 2D (since Arma 3 v1.99.146539, z coordinate is defaulted to 0) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> vector2: [[Array]] - vector 3D or 2D (since Arma 3 v1.99.146539, z coordinate is defaulted to 0)</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_distSqr = [[getPos]] [[player]] [[vectorDistanceSqr]] [0,0,2];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[vectorAdd]], [[vectorDiff]], [[vectorCrossProduct]], [[vectorDotProduct]], [[vectorCos]], [[vectorMagnitude]], [[vectorMagnitudeSqr]], [[vectorMultiply]], [[vectorDistance]], [[vectorDir]], [[vectorUp]], [[setVectorDir]], [[setVectorUp]], [[setVectorDirAndUp]], [[distanceSqr]], [[vectorNormalized]], [[vectorFromTo]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 28 Jun, 2014
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5| ffur2007slx2_5]]
<dd class="note">
(ArmA3 1.22)Algorithm:
<code>Vector1 = [x1,y1,z1]; Vector2 = [x2,y2,z2];
Result = (x2 - x1) ^ 2 + (y2 - y1) ^ 2 + (z2 - z1) ^ 2;</code>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
